title: VIIRS I-Band (500m) Surface Reflectance 8-Day
description: The 8-day VIIRS surface reflectance Version 1 composite product provides an estimate of land surface reflectance from the VIIRS sensor for three imagery bands (I1, I2, I3) at nominal 500 meter resolution (~463 meter). The 500 meter dataset is derived through resampling the native 375 meter VIIRS resolution in the Level 2 input product. Each pixel represents the best possible Level 2G observation during an 8-day period.
